issues.title: Women's Rights and Equal Pay
issues.description: Strong advocate for gender equality, supporting legislation to close wage gaps and protect reproductive rights

issues.title: Healthcare Access
issues.description: Supports expanding affordable healthcare, protecting the Affordable Care Act, and lowering prescription drug costs

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports Green New Deal principles, renewable energy investment, and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Gun Violence Prevention
issues.description: Advocates for stricter background checks, assault weapons ban, and comprehensive gun control measures

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased federal funding for public education, student loan debt relief, and affordable higher education

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with path to citizenship, DACA protections, and humane border policies

issues.title: Economic Justice
issues.description: Advocates for minimum wage increases, worker protections, and small business support
